### [ggsoccer](https://torvaney.github.io/ggsoccer/)

```{r visualise}
ggplot() +
  annotate_pitch() +
  theme_pitch()

pass_data <- data.frame(x = c(24, 18, 64, 78, 53),
                        y = c(43, 55, 88, 18, 44),
                        x2 = c(34, 44, 81, 85, 64),
                        y2 = c(40, 62, 89, 44, 28))

ggplot(pass_data) +
  annotate_pitch() +
  geom_segment(aes(x = x, y = y, xend = x2, yend = y2),
               arrow = arrow(length = unit(0.25, "cm"),
                             type = "closed")) +
  theme_pitch() +
  direction_label() +
  ggtitle("Simple passmap", 
          "ggsoccer example")
```
